name: Collie Quest Post Release
description:
Collie Quest from 3h gamejam, added a little bit of polish such as sound effects and a little menu.

--

Original 3h version can be found here:  https://l3pu5.itch.io/collie-quest

--

You are a collie who must protect the sheep. Bark at predators to scare them away but do NOT bark at the sheep.

Movement: WASD

Bark: Click

Menu: Escape
